title: Mauricio Pochettino - Wikipedia
snippet: Pochettino was born in Murphy, Santa Fe to Amalia and HÃ©ctor Pochettino, a farm labourer. His family is of Italian descent from Piedmont. Between the age of eight and ten, he played both football and volleyball, and also learned judo. He supported Racing Club de Avellaneda as a child.

title: Young Mauricio Pochettino's soccer upbringing - Soccer America
snippet: Mauricio's young life and soccer education could not have been more different than what the USMNT players he will coach experienced.

title: Mauricio Pochettino Profile
snippet: Born into a working-class Argentinean family of Italian descent, Mauricio Pochettino took to football at a young age, and his obsession has taken him all over the world.
